ARIZONA State Promoter (AZ Film, Production & Arts)
Zonie.com - Arizona Film & Production Resources and Referral

Dedicated to Promoting and Supporting Film, Production and The Arts, and Artists of Arizona since 1997. DebbieO has been a volunteer Arizona state promoter for the Film & Production industry for over 15 years via Zonie.com - Arizona Film & Production Resources and Referral.

Zonie.com is where you can find the best Arizona has to offer in the Film & Production Industry. · Professional Actors and Voice Talent · Casting Agents and Directors · Production Musicians & Artists · Film & Production Crew/Staff (stage and screen) · Pre & Post Productions Facilities · Auditions and Casting Notices (union and non union/paid and unpaid) · Arizona Film & Production Crew Jobs (union and non union/paid an unpaid) · Arizona Film & Production Business Listings · Arizona Shoot Locations · Arizona Film & Production Industry Classifieds · Production Industry Business & AZ Community Links · Arizona State Information (including AZ Film & Production Tax Credit Information) · Film/Production Industry DirectoryZonie is the place to find Arizona state Film and Production industry information, contacts, and get what you need for your upcoming productions and projects in our great state.
Founder of Zonie.com - Arizona Film & Production Resources and Referral ©1997/2011

DebbieO is the Founder (and owner) of the Arizona community servicve called, Zonie.com - Arizona Film & Production Resources and Referral ©1997/2011 -- totally dedicated to promoting and supporting film, production, theater, entertainment and the arts & artists of Arizona since 1997.http://www.Zonie.com [main site]http://www.zonie.com/tmp/ZonieForum [industry jobs & news]DebbieO's bio: http://www.zonie.com/tmp/ZonieForum/viewtopic.php?t=1416

Zonie.com - Arizona Film & Production Resources and Referral®

Zonie.com - Arizona Film & Production Resources and Referral® is listed and recognized by the Arizona State & City Film Commissions (and others worldwide), and is dedicated to Promoting and Supporting Film, Production & The Arts, and Artists of Arizona. The Zonie.com website and industry forums have been an Arizona community service since 1997. Read what others are saying about Zonie.com & Debbie Overbey (references and recommendations): www.zonie.com/tmp/ZonieForum/viewtopic.php?t=6682

Teri Frost
Independent Write-In Candidate for AZ State Senate District 1 at Arizona State Legislature
October 9, 2014, Debbie worked with Teri but at different companies

I've known Teri for years...she is an amazing woman! An Arizona native, Teri is very active in our community (on many levels), and always gives 110%. I recommend her highly in any endeavor she chooses to undertake. Teri is a seasoned professional with a down-home attitude that just won't quit. I've worked with her on many projects and always look forward for a chance to do so again. Teri is a valuable asset to any project or production!  [side note:] I understand Teri is running as a 2014 write in candidate for Arizona State Senate... I wish she lived in my district. She'd get my vote, hands down!

summary: I am Debbie Overbey. A volunteer Arizona State promoter for the AZ Film, Production, Arts & Entertainment Industry. I am the Founder and sole owner of Zonie.com - Arizona Film & Production Resources and Referral®, and have been totally dedicated to Promoting and Supporting Film, Production and the Arts, and artists of Arizona (via the community service, Zonie.com) since 1997.  ☆ Now celebrating 18 years of faithful Arizona community service online!I am a Film Producer/Director, Continuity Specialist, Writer, Photographer, Private Instructor, a Professional (Character/Method/Improv) Actor & award-winning Voice Artist (48+ years) and an Independent Film Critic. Needless to say... I like to keep busy, and love working every aspect of the arts entertainment industry. I thrive on helping and assisting others in the field to safely (and properly) make their dreams and careers reality. 2010 FameAZtv exclusive interview with Zonie.com Founder/owner, Debbie Overbey: http://vimeo.com/11746144 and www.fameaz.com DebbieO's bio: http://zonie.com/tmp/ZonieForum/viewtopic.php?t=1416Debbie Overbey's Credits: http://us.imdb.com/name/nm1894829 www.zonie.com/html/debbieoverbeySpecialties: Award winning, Professional Character/Method Actor. Voice Artists & VO Talent. Indie Producer/Director, writer and Continunity Specialist & Method/Character Actor Instructor. Founder of Zonie.com - Arizona Film & Production Resources and Referral®  -- Come film in the great State of... ARIZONA!
